name: Crown Delights Deli (itch)
description:
Note: Only the Windows build is available here at the moment. For the Mac build, find the game on Steam here!

Summary 
You're Jules, you just turned 15 two weeks ago, and you've been chilling around the house for your summer vacation so far. Your madre isn't too happy about that and has finally convinced you to try and find a small job for the rest of the summer.

You come across Javi's small corner bodega that goes by the name of Crown Delights Deli. Javi agrees to let you start working there, but he believes in learning on the job. You're immediately greeted with new faces and personalities and you must do your best to say the right thing.

Controls
Left-Click  -  Select
Esc - Pause

Team
Lianna Pang -  Producer, Game Designer, Writer
Isiah Rosa - Game Designer, Writer 
Mike Zhang -  Programmer, Game Designer
Kyra Zimmermann -  Illustrator
Chris Douglas  - Music & Sound
Nobonita Bhowmik - UI/UX Designer
Isaac Wirth - Original UI/UX
